sourcesContent:
<template>
  <NavigationHeader/>
  <router-view></router-view>
</template>

<script>
import NavigationHeader from '@/components/NavigationHeader.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavigationHeader
  },
  methods:{
    createOrder: async () => { // eslint-disable-line no-undef, no-unused-vars

      // Fetching the data from  your server

        await fetch("https://api.qat.anddone.com/create-payment-intent", {
          method: "POST",
          headers: {"Content-Type": "application/json"},
          body: JSON.stringify({
            amount: 1,
            title: "Transaction Title",
            expiresIn: "3000",
          }),
        }).then(res=> res.json()).then((res) => {
          
          let pluginOption ={
            theme : "classic",  // classic, modern, minimal, vibrant
            container: "mywidget",  // id of the div to render the widget
          }

          //Assigning the payment token received from your server

          let paymentIntentToken=res.paymentIntentToken

        // Initialize the plugin with token and options

          let andDone = new AndDone(paymentIntentToken, pluginOption);// eslint-disable-line no-undef, no-unused-vars


        // Using onload function to perform some action after the widget is loaded  and ready
          andDone.onload = (plugin) =>  // eslint-disable-line no-undef, no-unused-vars
          {
        
            console.log("Widget loaded successfully");
          
          }
        })
      }
  },  
  mounted() {
      // this.createOrder();
      // let andDone = new AndDone(paymentIntentToken); // eslint-disable-line no-undef, no-unused-vars
      // fetch('https://api.qat.anddone.com')
      //   .then(function(response){
      //     console.log(response.json());
      //   });
  }
}

async function createOrder() {

  // Fetching the data from  your server

    await fetch("http://localhost:4242/create-payment-intent", {
      method: "POST",
      headers: {"Content-Type": "application/json"},
      body: JSON.stringify({
        amount: "111.00",
        title: "Title_01_0303_2022",
        shortDescription: "shortDescription",
        paymentDescription: "paymentDescription",
        invoiceNumber: "invoiceNumber-005",
        expiresIn: "3000",
        intent: {
            paymentTypes: [
                "DebitCard",
                "CreditCard",
                "ACH"
            ]
        }
    }),
    }).then(res=> res.json()).then((res) => {
      let pluginOption ={
        theme : "classic",  // classic, modern, minimal, vibrant
        container: "mywidget",  // id of the div to render the widget
      }

      //Assigning the payment token received from your server

      let paymentIntentToken=res.paymentIntentToken
      console.log(paymentIntentToken);
     // Initialize the plugin with token and options

    // eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
      let andDone = new AndDone(paymentIntentToken, pluginOption); 


    // Using onload function to perform some action after the widget is loaded  and ready
     // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars
      andDone.onload = (plugin) =>
      {
     
         console.log("Widget loaded successfully");
       
      }
    })
  }

  

  createOrder()
</script>
